Text: The whole aim of practical politics is to keep the populace alarmed (and hence clamorous to be led to safety) by menacing it with an endless series of hobgoblins, all of them imaginary.
Label: MANIPULATIVE

Text: Let us not seek the Republican answer or the Democratic answer but the right answer.
Label: NOT_MANIPULATIVE

Text: What is objectionable, what is dangerous about extremists is not that they are extreme, but that they are intolerant.
Label: NOT_MANIPULATIVE

Text: Suppose you were an idiot, and suppose you were a member of Congress; but I repeat myself.
Label: MANIPULATIVE

Text: Political correctness to me is just intellectual terrorism. I find that really scary, and I won't be intimidated into changing my mind.
Label: MANIPULATIVE

Text: When people learn no tools of judgment and merely follow their hopes, the seeds of political manipulation are sown.
Label: MANIPULATIVE

Text: Bad officials are elected by good citizens who do not vote.
Label: NOT_MANIPULATIVE

Text: No citizen is apolitical; as a citizen, by definition, has to take interest in public affairs.
Label: NOT_MANIPULATIVE

Text: Everything about the left is perception, manipulation, and lies. Everything. Everything is 'Wag the Dog.' Everything is a structured deception.
Label: MANIPULATIVE

Text: Never has man reached his destination by persistence in deviation from the straight path.
Label: NOT_MANIPULATIVE

Text: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
Label: NOT_MANIPULATIVE

Text: People never lie so much as after a hunt, during a war or before an election.
Label: MANIPULATIVE

Text: Democracy is a slow process of stumbling to the right decision instead of going straight forward to the wrong one.
Label: NOT_MANIPULATIVE

Text: Politics is an act of faith; you have to show some kind of confidence in the intellectual and moral capacity of the public.
Label: NOT_MANIPULATIVE

Text: Turn on to politics, or politics will turn on you.
Label: NOT_MANIPULATIVE

Text: Make the enemy live up to its own book of rules.
Label: MANIPULATIVE

Text: Never go outside the experience of your people.
Label: NOT_MANIPULATIVE

Text: A good tactic is one your people enjoy.
Label: NOT_MANIPULATIVE

Text: The ballot is stronger than the bullet.
Label: NOT_MANIPULATIVE

Text: Justice will not be served until those who are unaffected are as outraged as those who are.
Label: NOT_MANIPULATIVE
